name: Evian Christ
description: '''Joshua Leary''' (born 11 June 1989), better known by the stage name '''Evian Christ''', is an English electronic music producer, DJ, songwriter and [[performance art]]ist from Ellesmere Port, UK. He is signed to [[Tri Angle Records]], [[Warp (record label)|Warp]] and [[Kanye West]]â€™s publishing house [[Donda (company)|Donda]] and record label [[GOOD Music#Very Good Beats|Very Good Beats]]. He released his debut [[mixtape]] ''Kings and Them'' in 2012 and gained prominence as a collaborator on West's 2013 album ''[[Yeezus]]''. He released a further EP on Tri Angle, ''Waterfall'', in 2014, and released his debut album on [[Warp (record label)|Warp Records]], ''[[Revanchist (album)|Revanchist]]'', in 2023.
